events.title: Drone Building Contest
events.description: Join our exciting drone building competition and showcase your engineering skills. Learn about drone assembly, flight mechanics, and programming.

events.title: Microcontroller Basics
events.description: Basics on microcontrollers and how they work. Learn about architecture, programming, and practical applications in robotics.

events.title: Hackathon 2024
events.description: A 48-hour coding marathon to build innovative solutions for real-world robotics challenges. Form teams and compete for exciting prizes.

events.title: Drone Tech
events.description: Working of drones and the latest drone technology. Explore advanced drone capabilities, sensors, and autonomous flight systems.

events.title: Robotics Lecture Series
events.description: A comprehensive series of lectures covering various aspects of robotics from basic principles to advanced topics.

events.title: Microcontroller Coding
events.description: Basic to advanced levels of microcontroller coding. Learn programming techniques for various applications in robotics and automation.

events.title: Workshop on AI Robotics
events.description: Learn how to integrate AI technologies into robotics applications. Topics include machine learning, computer vision, and natural language processing.

events.title: Orientation
events.description: Introduction to Yantra IIT and overview of upcoming events and opportunities. Meet the team and learn about how to get involved.
